meanings.sent1: After making changes to the code, I need to recompile it.
meanings.sent2: Developers often recompile their programs to check for errors.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally deleted my work, so now I'm recompiling everything from scratch!
meanings.sent4: Recompiling is like giving a fresh coat of paint to your software.
meanings.sent5: The process of recompiling can help ensure the program runs smoothly.

meanings.sent1: The recompiling of the project took longer than expected.
meanings.sent2: We encountered a bug during the recompiling of the code.
meanings.sent3: The constant recompiling of the document was starting to get tedious.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for recompiling old programs was truly inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The recompiling process can sometimes reveal hidden errors.
